title: EmployeeRole
description: A subclass of OrganizationRole used to describe employee relationships.

allOf.description: A subclass of Role used to describe roles within organizations.

salaryCurrency.description: The currency (coded using ISO 4217 ) used for the main salary information in this job posting or for this employee.

baseSalary.description: The base salary of the job or of an employee in an EmployeeRole.
